title.rendered: Best Trusted Free Android Photo Editing Apps

content.rendered:
Need some help choosing the best photo editing app to work with? There are thousands of photo-editing, photo filter, and Instagram editing apps available for Android and it’s overwhelming trying to figure out which ones are the best. Which is why we’ve compiled our top picks to make your decisions a little bit easier.

Whether you’re an expert or beginner Android photographer these trusted photo editing apps will be sure to get the job done. These apps are not listed in any particular order.

PicsArt

PicsArt is an Editor’s Choice photo editor and video & collage maker. With over 500 Million installs, you can’t go wrong with installing this app as your go-to content creation tool.

Features:

  • Photo editor
  • Video editor
  • Remix & free to edit images
  • Sketch

The app also includes premium features for creators who need an all-in-one photo editing solution.

We’d highly recommend PicsArt to anyone as it’s an amazing one stop shop for all things photos. The developers are constantly releasing new features as well.

Adobe Photoshop Express

Photoshop is a household name for a reason. Adobe’s Photoshop Express is another Editor’s Choice, and we definitely stand by that decision. This app is excellent for photo correction, editing, and collage & custom graphic creation.

Features:

  • Perspective correction
  • Noise removal
  • Blur
  • Stickers, memes, texts, fonts, and more
  • Collages
  • Spot healing 
  • Quick fixes

The app is like having a mini professional studio in your pocket. We’d highly recommend Photoshop Express for any Android Photographers who are constantly on the go and need quality solutions for photo editing on the fly. 

Pixaloop

Pixaloop is what any cutting-edge creator needs in their toolbox. The app was chosen as Google Play’s Best App of 2019 and is loved by millions of people across the globe. Pixaloop is a standard photo editor, but with a twist – it also allows you to bring your photos to life with animation.

Features

  • Animation creator
  • Animated sky filters
  • Overlays
  • Video effects
  • Custom movement functionality

Pixaloop is great for elevating your Instagram Story game and social presence in general. 

Don’t Lose Your Photos

Now that you have an idea of the top photo editing apps available on Android, make sure you don’t lose any of your edited content! If you’re a person prone to fumbling around with technology or your phone consider using Dumpster to back up your photos. 

Try it for Free Right Now!
